forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then cloudy with rain likely during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday
